reviewText: With a useless boy missing the dozen of hints throw in his face on an almost hourly basis. A reset button is used at the end that makes this tale a forgetful as the many being made in Japan on a yearly basis. But since this was the last DvD, I obviously bought them all and I did like how some of the stories panned out within. So if you're into "harem" styled stories, I recommend this one reluctately.
The end of Yumeria is slightly confising and I personally found it a bit hard to follow. Otherwise it was a great series.
